name: Todo List
description: Manage your lists and items they contain.

create_list.description: Create a new to-do list based on the given list name.

list_name.description: The name of the to-do list to create.

get_list_items.description: Retrieve all items from a specific to-do list.

list_name.description: The name of the to-do list to retrieve items from.

old_list_name.description: The current name of the to-do list.

new_list_name.description: The new name for the to-do list.

list_name.description: The name of the to-do list to delete.

add_todos.description: Add items to a specific to-do list.

list_name.description: The name of the to-do list to add items to.

items.description: The items to add to the list.

complete_items.description: Mark items as completed in a specific to-do list.

list_name.description: The name of the to-do list containing the items to complete.

items.description: The items to mark as completed.

uncomplete_items.description: Mark items as incomplete in a specific to-do list.

list_name.description: The name of the to-do list containing the items to mark as incomplete.

items.description: The items to mark as incomplete.

action_notes: Always consider to not use "list" as a suffix in a list_name. E.g. "device list" = "device", "shopping list" = "shopping".
